original: 當前據點的建物情況，建物的最大等級以及可建設數量受到當前據點規模影響，據點最大可建設數量受到據點規模上限影響
text: The current building situation of the stronghold, the maximum level of buildings and the number of buildings that can be built are affected by the current stronghold size, and the maximum number of strongholds that can be built is affected by the upper limit of the size of the stronghold
